00025 /* Location list */
00026 ob_start();
00027 echo '<option value="0">'.__('All Locations').'</option>';
00028 $loc_q = $dbs->query('SELECT location_name FROM mst_location LIMIT 50');
00029 while ($loc_d = $loc_q->fetch_row()) {
00030     echo '<option value="'.$loc_d[0].'">'.$loc_d[0].'</option>';
00031 }
00032 $location_list = ob_get_clean();
00033

00039     echo '<option value="'.$colltype_d[0].'">'.$colltype_d[0].'</option>';

00052 /* Language selection list */
00053 ob_start();
00054 require_once(LANGUAGES_BASE_DIR.'localisation.php');
00055 foreach ($available_languages AS $lang_index) {
00056             $selected = null;
00057             $lang_code = $lang_index[0];
00058             $lang_name = $lang_index[1];
00059             if ($lang_code == $sysconf['default_lang']) {
00060                 $selected = 'selected';
00061             }
00062             echo '<option value="'.$lang_code.'" '.$selected.'>'.$lang_name.'</option>';
00063 }
00064 $language_select = ob_get_clean();
00065 
00066 /* include simbio form element library */
00067 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_element.inc.php';
00068 /* Advanced Search Author AJAX field */
00069 ob_start();
00070 // create AJAX drop down
00071 $ajaxDD = new simbio_fe_AJAX_select();
00072 $ajaxDD->element_name = 'author';
00073 $ajaxDD->element_css_class = 'ajaxInputField';
00074 $ajaxDD->additional_params = 'type=author';
00075 $ajaxDD->handler_URL = 'lib/contents/advsearch_AJAX_response.php';
00076 echo $ajaxDD->out();
00077 $advsearch_author = ob_get_clean();
00078
